", "answer": "The CVC Internship Scheme is an initiative by the Central Vigilance Commission to engage Indian nationals who are graduates or postgraduate students in reputed universities/institutions, both in India and abroad, as interns. It aims to provide them with exposure to the Commission's functioning and contribute to its policy formulation.
